text: The G20 (or Group of Twenty) is an international forum for the governments and central bank governors from 19 countries and the European Union (EU). It was founded in 1999. The goal is to coordinate global policy on trade, health climate and other prominent issues as well as promoting international financial stability. Together, the nations of the G20 account for almost 80% of the global economic output. The figures have remained stable, while the G7 is shrinking. Since the November 2011 Cannes summit, G20` summits have been held annually."" ==Current G20 Leaders== File:Javier Milei en el Salón Blanco 2 (cropped) (2).jpg| Argentina Javier Milei, President File:Anthony Albanese portrait (cropped).jpg| Australia Anthony Albanese, Prime Minister File:Foto oficial de Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (estreita).jpg| Brazil Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva, President File:Trudeau visit White House for USMCA (cropped).jpg| Canada Justin Trudeau, Prime Minister File:Xi Jinping 2019.jpg| China Xi Jinping, President File:Emmanuel Macron January 2022.jpg| France Emmanuel Macron, President File:Olaf Scholz In March 2022.jpg| Germany Olaf Scholz, Chancellor File:Prime Minister Modi in July 2021.jpg| India Narendra Modi, Prime Minister File:Joko Widodo 2019 official portrait.jpg| Indonesia Joko Widodo, President File:Ishiba Shigeru 20241001 (cropped).jpg| Japan Shigeru Ishiba, Prime Minister File:South Korea President Yoon Suk Yeol portrait.jpg| South Korea Yoon Suk-yeol, President File:Claudia Sheinbaum con la banda presidencial (cropped) (2).jpg| Mexico Claudia Sheinbaum, President File:Владимир Путин (13-11-2021) (cropped).jpg| Russia Vladimir Putin, President File:Salman of Saudi Arabia -
